meanings.definition: Quick or lively in movement or action.
meanings.sent1: The squirrel moved brisker than the turtle.
meanings.sent2: She walked brisker when she was running late.
meanings.sent3: The brisker puppy chased its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: The brisker wind carried the kite higher and higher.
meanings.sent5: The brisker dance routine impressed the audience with its energy.

meanings.sent1: The brisker air made her shiver.
meanings.sent2: The tea became brisker as it cooled down.
meanings.sent3: The brisker ice cream melted quickly in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The brisker morning signaled the arrival of autumn.
meanings.sent5: The brisker water in the pool refreshed the swimmers on a hot day.
